tool_description: Make use of World's most popular font conversion service in your app or service. Convert between font formats. Supports ttf, otf, woff, woff2, svg, sfd, ufo, pt1, pfa, pfb and many many more formats.
name: Font Conversion
title: Font Conversion

api_list.name: Add Font
api_list.description: Font file to add to the system.

required_parameters.name: font
required_parameters.description: Font file to add to the system.

api_list.name: Convert Font
api_list.description: Convert the font to a specified target format.

required_parameters.name: targetformat
required_parameters.description: Target font format you want to convert to.

optional_parameters.name: binaryresult
optional_parameters.description: Whether to return converted file in binary format, the default is base64 json response(value 0).
